lead_paragraph: Most people stop pulling all-nighters when they graduate from college. Not Olivier Azevedo. He stayed up until 3:30 a.m. Monday, working. Making sure that everything fit through doors, that nothing was dropped, that everything was properly positioned.
snippet: Positioning two large Dalí sculptures, "Persistence of Memory" and "Woman Aflame," at the Time Warner Center in Manhattan was no easy task.

headline.main: For Dalí's Work, an Eye on the Clock

abstract: Positioning two large Dalí sculptures, "Persistence of Memory" and "Woman Aflame," at the Time Warner Center in Manhattan was no easy task.
